name: Inbound Market Link

overview:
Inbound Market Link is a full service Internet Marketing Company employing modern â€˜Inbound Marketing’ techniques and methodologies to help its customers materialize their internet objectives through effective marketing online.

We offer a highly targeted series of services that specifically address key functional areas required for your company to be successful in marketing itself on the internet. To put it in the vernacular of today, we do Inbound Marketing.

The term â€˜Inbound Marketing’ is a reference that has developed along with the rapid evolution of the internet. Marketing strategies of today leverage the way in which people shop via on-line access and search engines. Inbound Marketing is a methodology used by businesses on the web that focuses on getting â€˜found’ by customers and further attracting them by offering valuable content and thought leadership.

In short, inbound marketers earn their way in to their customers, as opposed to â€˜Outbound Marketing’ where marketers use advertising techniques designed to impart a message through interruption.
